SELECT li.id, li.order_id, li.remark, li.create_date, li.current_logistics, li.del_flag,
oi.CODE AS orderCode, oi.materials_code, oi.total_price, oi.STATUS,
si.CODE AS supplierCode, si.NAME AS supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images AS supplierImages,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit FROM logistics_info li LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON (oi.id = li.order_id) LEFT JOIN supplier_info si ON (si.id = oi.supplier_id) LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.CODE = oi.materials_code) WHERE 1 = 1 AND li.current_logistics = 1
AND si.name like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.supplierName},"%")
AND oi.code like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.orderCode},"%")
AND mi.NAME like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.materialsName},"%")
GROUP BY li.order_id ORDER BY li.create_date DESC
